result.eng: He forced her to give up the child.
result.ga: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.orig: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.html: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithiHe forced her to give up the child.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé iaċall uirṫi an páiste a ṫaḃairt uaiṫiHe forced her to give up the child.

result.eng: I'm an only child.
result.ga: is páiste aonair mé
result.orig: is páiste aonair mé
result.html: is páiste aonair méI'm an only child.
result.ponchtml: is páiste aonair méI'm an only child.

result.eng: Non-marital child.

result.html: leanbh lasmuigh den phósadhNon-marital child.

result.eng: They give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ga: tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste
result.orig: tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste

result.ponchtml: tugann siad coṁairle do ċailíní a ḃíonn ag súil le páisteThey give advice to girls who are expecting a child.

result.eng: The child is running.
result.ga: tá an páiste ag rith
result.orig: tá an páiste ag rith
result.html: tá an páiste ag rithThe child is running.
result.ponchtml: tá an páiste ag riṫThe child is running.

result.eng: The child is under the table.
result.ga: tá an páiste faoin tábla
result.orig: tá an páiste faoin tábla
result.html: tá an páiste faoin táblaThe child is under the table.
result.ponchtml: tá an páiste faoin táblaThe child is under the table.

result.eng: She is expecting a child.
result.ga: tá sí ag súil le páiste
result.orig: tá sí ag súil le páiste
result.html: tá sí ag súil le páisteShe is expecting a child.
result.ponchtml: tá sí ag súil le páisteShe is expecting a child.

result.eng: We've had a small child for a year.
result.ga: tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.orig: tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.html: tá leanbh óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.
result.ponchtml: tá leanḃ óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.

result.eng: You are expecting another child, aren't you?
result.ga: tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuil
result.orig: tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuil
result.html: tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuilYou are expecting another child, aren't you?
result.ponchtml: tá siḃ ag súil le páiste eile naċ ḃfuilYou are expecting another child, aren't you?

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.html: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ponchtml: tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: His wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.
result.ga: tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí
result.orig: tá a bhean ag súil le páiste i gceann cúpla mí

result.eng: I'm an only child.
result.ga: is páiste aonair mé
result.orig: is páiste aonair mé
result.html: is páiste aonair méI'm an only child.
result.ponchtml: is páiste aonair méI'm an only child.

result.eng: I have no brothers or sisters – I'm an only child.
result.ga: níl deartháir ná deirfiúr ar bith agam – is páiste aonair mé
result.orig: níl deartháir ná deirfiúr ar bith agam – is páiste aonair mé

result.ponchtml: níl dearṫáir ná deirfiúr ar biṫ agam – is páiste aonair méI have no brothers or sisters – I'm an only child.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.

result.eng: They had a two-year old child.
result.ga: bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.orig: bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.html: bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.
result.ponchtml: ḃí páiste ḋá ḃliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: How did you spend the day, child?
result.ga: goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.orig: goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.html: goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbhHow did you spend the day, child?

result.eng: What is it? A girl. {of newborn child}
result.ga: goidé an duine atá ann girseach
result.orig: goidé an duine atá ann girseach
result.html: goidé an duine atá ann girseachWhat is it? A girl. {of newborn child}
result.ponchtml: goidé an duine atá ann girseaċWhat is it? A girl. {of newborn child}

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.orig: bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh

result.eng: I was their only child.
result.ga: ní raibh acu ach mé
result.orig: ní raibh acu ach mé
result.html: ní raibh acu ach méI was their only child.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ acu aċ méI was their only child.
